LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Gamma.label: type - gamma
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Gamma.description: Automech Neko in shooting form. Equipped with a laser particle cannon.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Gamma.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Gamma.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Gamma.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Alpha.label: type - alpha
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Alpha.description: Base model Automech Neko. It has a fast movement speed and attacks at close range.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Alpha.tools.0.label: left blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Alpha.tools.1.label: right blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Alpha.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Xi.label: type - xi
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Xi.description: A small mechcat. Although it moves quickly, its body is fragile.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Xi.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Xi.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Xi.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Mega.label: type - mega
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Mega.description: mega Automech Neko.A huge, The huge, heavy robot, although it has no shooting weapon, carries a impact drill and can cause extensive damage.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Mega.tools.0.label: left blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Mega.tools.1.label: right blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Mega.tools.2.label: head
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Omega.label: type - omega
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Omega.description: The ultimate form of Automech Neko. It is equipped with two high explosive bomb launchers. At the same time, the huge mechanical claw has a strong impact. When its ammunition is used up, it will switch to melee mode.
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Omega.tools.0.label: left blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Omega.tools.1.label: right blade
LanguageData.SZMechNeko_Omega.tools.2.label: head
